CHAPTER.VERS: Keimah Paul le Silas le Timoti-te in:Pasian le Topa Jesuh Khrih sungah a om, Thesalonika khua-a om pawlpi mite tungah lai ka hong khak uh hi.
Pa Pasian le Topa Jesuh Khrih in note tungah dikna le nopsakna thupha hong tungsak tahen.

Sanggamte aw, note’ upna nakpitakin khang a, note khatlekhat na ki-itna uh lian semsem ahih manin Pasian tungah lungdamna koh ding a kilawm ahih mah bangin, note hangin ama tungah lungdamna ka ko tawntung uh hi.
Bawlsiatna le gimna na thuakna khempeuh uhah na upna uh khahsuah loin thuakzo paisuak na hih manun midangte kiangah Pasian’ pawlpi ka na kisialhpih uh hi.
Tu-a na thuaknate uh hangin Pasian’ Ukna sungah a om dingin a kilawm mi suak na hih manun Pasian’ thukhenna a man ahihna hong kilangsak hi.
Pasian in a manin na sem ding ahih manin note a hong gimsak mite tungah Pasian in gimna pia dinga,
tu-a gimna a thuak note le kote tungah zong nopsakna hong pia ding hi. Vantung panin Topa Jesuh le a vanglian a vantung mite, meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin,
Pasian a thei lo mite le i Topa Jesuh tawh kisai Lungdamna Thu a um lo mite tungah gimna a tungsak ding hi.

Ama mite khempeuh le thu um mite khempeuh hangin minthanna le pahtawina a ngah dingin Topa hong pai Ni ciangin a noptuak mahmah Topa’ minthanna huamsung panin amaute kihawl khia dinga, tawntung suksiatna dan a thuak ding uh hi. Ahi zongin note in kong gen uh thute um na hih manun tua nopna sungah na om ding uh hi.

Tua ahih manin ama hong sapna tawh a kilawm a kituak nuntakna na nuntak theih nading uh le ama vangliatna tawh a hoih na hihnop khempeuh uh hih zo-in, na upna uh hangin na khempeuh na zawh theih nadingun Pasian kiangah thu ka hong ngetsak tawntung uh hi.
Tua hileh, eite’ Pa Pasian le Topa Jesuh Khrih hong hehpihna hangin note in ama tung panin minthanna ngahin, ama min zong a thangsak na hi ding uh hi.
Sanggamte aw, i Topa Jesuh Khrih hong pai nading thu le amah a dawn dingin eite i kikhop nading thu tawh kisai-in note kiangah kong thum nopna uh panin:

Topa’ hong pai ding ni hong tung khinta hi, ci-a thu kigenna hangin lunghimawhin lungmangin om kei un. Thuhilh khat peuhpeuh in hih bang thu hong genkha thei dinga, tua thu pen kote’ gen leh gelh hi, ci-in zong genkha ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin kuama khemsa-in ta kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh nakpitakin Pasian langpanna lianpi le hell khuksung a tung ding ahi A Gilopa hong kilat matengin tua Ni hong tung lo ding hi.

Tua A Gilopa in mite’ biak pasian a kici khempeuh le na khempeuh nial gawp ding hi. Tuate khempeuh sangin a lian zaw-in a kingaihsut banah, Pasian ka hi hi, ci-in Pasian’ biakinn sung mahmahah pai-in va tu ding hi.
Note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in hih thute khempeuh hong genkhin ka hih manin na phawk lai ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin tu laitakin tua bang a pian loh nadingin a kham khat om ahihna thu na thei uh hi. A hun a tun ciangin A Gilopa hong kilang ding hi.
Kuamah kim in a phawk loh Gitloh Gamtatna kigamta khinta a, ahi zongin hih thu a pian ding a khamcip pa a kilakkhiat khit matengin a hong piang ding thu hong piang nai lo ding hi.
A khamcip pa a kilakkhiat khit ciangin A Gilopa hong kilang dinga, Topa Jesuh hong pai ciangin tua A Gilopa mutlum dinga, vanglian minthangin hong kilatna tawh a maimangsak ding hi.
Satan’ vangliatna tawh A Gilopa hong pai-in, lim le nalamdang a tuamtuamte hong bawl dinga,
gitloh khemna a nam tuamtuam zangin, siatna a thuak ding mite a khem ding hi. Tua bang mite in a suahtak nadingun thuman sang nuam lo, deih lo uh ahih manin siatna a tuak uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian in amaute lakah nasem dingin zuau thahatna paisak ahih manin amaute in a man lo thu um uh hi.
Tua ahih manin thuman um loin, mawhna sungah nuam a sa khempeuh in mawhsak thukhenna thuak ding uh hi.

Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, Topa in note hong it a, Kha Siangtho vangliatna hang le note in thuman na upna uh hangin ama mi siangthote na suah nadingun nopsakna a ngah masa dingin Pasian in note hong teel ahih manin note hangin Pasian tungah lungdamna ka ko tawntung uh hi.
Topa Jesuh Khrih tawh minthanna na ngahkhawm theih nadingun note tungah kong hilh uh Lungdamna Thu tawh hih nopsakna ah Pasian in note a hong sam ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, kam tawh ahi a, lai tawh ahi zongin kong hilh uh thumante limtakin zui unla, kiptakin om un.
I Topa Jesuh Khrih mahmah leh, eite hong itin, a hong hehpihna tawh thakhauhna le lametna a hong pia tawntung eite’ Pa Pasian in
note lungsimah thakhauhna hong guan henla, a hoih thu khempeuh genin a sem zo dingin na tha uh hong hatsak tahen.
Sanggamte aw, tu-in note lak mah bangin mun dangah zong Topa’ thu manlang takin kizel pakin lungdam takin a kisan theih nadingin kote ading thu hong ngetsak un.
Mi khempeuh in thu um nai lo uh ahih manin a gilo a siahuai mite panin Pasian in kote hong hotkhiat nadingin zong hong ngetsak un.
Note ahihleh, Topa citak mahmah ahih manin hong thahatsak dinga, A Gilopa kiang panin hong hon khia ding hi.
Note kiangah kong gen uh thute a kipat cil a kipanin na zuih uh mah bangin zui paisuak taktak ding, ci-in note muanna lungsim kote sungah Topa in hong guan hi.
Pasian bangin itna nei-in Khrih thuak bangin na thuak zawh nadingun Topa in note lungsim hong bawlsak tahen.
Sanggamte aw, i Topa Jesuh Khrih min tawh kong sawlnop uh thu panin: Note tungah ka hong hilhsa uh thute a zui lo, a thadah gamtat thu uppih mite tawh na kikhawl kei un.
Kote’ gamtatzia bangin a gamta ding na hihna uh teltakin na thei uh hi. Note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-un ka thadah om kei uh hi.
Kuama an a khongin ka ne kei uh hi. Note khat peuhpeuh in nong suplawhkhak loh nadingun a sun a zanin hahkat takin na ka sem uh hi.
Hih bangin ka gamtatna uh pen note’ hong piakte a khongin ne-in a zang dingin a kilawm mah hinapi-in, note’ etteh ding gamtatzia a hong lak ka hizaw uh hi.
Note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-un, “Na a sem nuam lo mi peuhmah an nesak kei un,” ci-in kong gen uh hi.
Hih bangin thu ka hong genna uh pen note lakah mi pawlkhatte thadahin na sem nuam lo uh a, midangte’ nasepna va nawngkaisak zawsop hi, ci-in ka zakna hang uh ahi hi.
Tu-in tua bang mite in kuamah nawngkaisak nawn loin man manin na sem hiathiatin amau’ nuntak nadingun na a sep nadingun Topa Jesuh Khrih min tawh hanthawnin thu kong pia uh hi.
Sanggamte aw, note in a hoihin gamtat ding na cimtak ngei het kei ta un.
Hih lai sunga ka hong gente uh a zui nuam lo mi khatpeuh a om leh tua mipa limtakin ciamteh unla, amah a maizum theih nadingin kikholhpih nawn kei un.
Ahi zongin amah galbawl kei unla, thu uppih mi khat hihna tawh hilhbawl zaw un.
Eite tungah nopsakna a hong pia thei Topa in note tungah a tawntungin nopsakna hong pia henla, amah in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen.
\k Keimah Paul in kong hopih hi, \k* cihna kammal teng keima khut tawh ka hong gelh ahi hi. Keima laikhak khempeuh hih bangzia-in ciamtehin ka hih ngeina ahi hi.
I Topa Jesuh Khrih hong hehpihna thupha note khempeuh tungah hong tung tahen.
